body: When the witch uses her cauldron to brew a potion, she may spend double the cost to create 2 identical potions that day instead of just 1. At 15th level, she may spend triple the cost to create 3 identical potions that day. The witch must have the cauldron hex to select this hex.
name: Witch's Brew
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Major Hexes/Witchs Brew
